catchphrase: HalfStack Vienna will return in 2026 at Ankersaal near the Hauptbahnhof.
description: Join up to 200 awesome JS and web people in the old Ankersaal bread factory for an amazing day of fun. A mix of Vienna and visiting presenters telling great stories, never vendor pitches, great food and drinks, and an afterparty with our infamous JS Pub Quiz and karaoke.
faqs: If you're not from Vienna, note that HalfStack Vienna is near the HbF (main train station). Vienna has many hotels and Airbnb options that are well connected via u-bahn, trains, and buses.
We've had to delay from 2025 to the Spring of 2026. We'll announce the exact date soon.
schedule: Plan to arrive between 09:00 and 09:30 on the day of the event & stay late for an amazing day of JavaScript goodness!

description: This is the start of our 2026 lineup. We will announce more presenters between now and the event.
sessions.title: More to be revealed

description: We have been delighted by building your own Dance Dance Revolution game and more in the past. We will soon share what Carmen has in store for us in 2026!
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: Maros will guide us through the principles of Nonviolent Communication and demonstrate how we can apply them to enhance our daily work.
sessions.title: Nonviolent Communication in Software Testing

description: Master the art of efficient decision-making and turn slow, ineffective engineering decisions into a powerful competitive advantage.
sessions.title: Eliminate the Engineering Department of Redundancy Department

description: We will share more closer to the event, but there will definitely be cats.
sessions.title: Purr-mission Denied: Securing Your App with ReBAC

description: Something I've been thinking about a lot recently. Simplicity is the most prized property we can strive towards when programming & building. high-level stuff I think would be relevant to any dev.
sessions.title: The Importance of Simplicity
